doc.after: A particle system is a technique in game physics and computer graphics that uses a large number of very small sprites or other graphic objects to simulate certain kinds of fuzzy phenomena which are otherwise very hard to reproduce with conventional rendering techniques usually highly chaotic systems natural phenomena or processes caused by chemical reactions
